body.name: Vinsetto Microfiber Home Office Chair, Tufted Height Adjustable Computer Desk Chair with Swivel Wheels and Padded Armrests, Light Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 56 mins.
features: Chic Upholstery Fabric: The upholstered fabric of this office chair offers a stylish and modern look that will effortlessly blend with any indoor décor in your home office or computer room.
Adjustable Height: You can use the lever to adjust the height of this computer chair from 35.25" to 38.25" to match your desk and sitting style.
Added Mobility: This desk chair has 360-degree swivel wheels and a seat, while the tilt function allows you to stretch out your back during your breaks.
Full Back Support: The thick foam padded backrest and seat allow for complete relaxation while working, and the padded armrests create less pressure on your wrists and elbows.
Sturdy Build: This home office chair has a weight capacity of 264 lbs. Suitable and stable for most users.
body.description: This home office chair from Vinsetto proves that functionality doesn't have to mean a sacrifice in style. This mid-back swivel chair features a stylish fabric and steel base that provides all-day support to your upper and lower regions. A padded seat, armrests, and backrest extend this for extra comfort and support. Take your productivity to the next level with a rolling chair that brings out your very best performance. Leather-like microfiber cloth is breathable and easy cleaning Padded seat cushion and backrest with comfortable armrest for extra support Adjustable height to be the most comfortable for your desk and sitting preferences 360-degree swivel base with smooth-rolling casters for convenient multitasking Sturdy chair supports a 264-pound weight capacity Backrest can rock back and forth for added comfort during breaks Assembly required

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We know business – heck, we are running one right now. Because of our experience, we know that organization and efficiency can make or break a company. With Vinsetto, we aim to makes those ideals a reality. With our line of high-quality office chairs, storage cabinets and organizers, whiteboards, and marketing sandwich boards, we can assist in making your office or small business run like clockwork. Let us handle organization and comfort, so you can focus on what matters: your work. This home office chair from Vinsetto proves that functionality doesn't have to mean a sacrifice in style. This mid-back swivel chair features a stylish fabric and steel base that provides all-day support to your upper and lower regions. A padded seat, armrests, and backrest extend this for extra comfort and support. Take your productivity to the next level with a rolling chair that brings out your very best performance. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are great for our dinning room. They are a soft almost sand gray which matches our space perfect. Assembly was easy but would suggest keeping bolts looser until all connected. Love the up and down and rocking feature. Being able to wipe these down versus having cloth is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price but screw holes do not line up at all
reviews.reviewText: First, I was surprised that the arms has to be screwed into the seat back and seat cushion. It was awkward trying to get them to line up by myself. I worked on it for about 90 min then had to get to my desk and work. Worked up a bit of a sweat doing that. I decided I’d finish putting in the screws a little at a time.One note is that I was short a couple of washers. Make sure you use them on the chair and not on the base.Finally got it put together and am so far pleased but it’s only been a couple of days. It’s a little larger than expected but the arms fit under my desk so I’m happy with that. I wouldn’t worry about back support because if you work at your computer you wouldn’t normally be leaning back. Rolls nicely across the chair pad. It’s a good looking chair. The gray is a little on the mocha side but I like it. I’m at my desk all day so I will update my review to report on how it’s holding up.I’d give it a five if it wasn’t so difficult to put together and the screw holes actually lined up.Update 9 mos later: This chair has held up remarkably well for 9 mos. It’s still very comfortable to sit but I’ve added a small memory foam chair pad to lift me up a bit. Perfect. I work at my desk all day, have 2 dogs that live in the office with me. No dog hair problems with this chair. Wheels are still gliding smoothly and fabric has held up. It is a deep chair so not ergonomic. I stil up straight but a back pillow may help. Otherwise a very satisfactory purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and wide
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very beautiful, fabric feels nice. Pretty wide, comfortable to sit, but I can already tell, that coushion is gonna be flat very soon, so you will need a pillow of some kind. Not very tall even on the highest setting, but feels sturdy enough. I can easily sit crosslegged in it (5'4" 130 lb).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This chair took me 2 hours to put together. I had my 10 year old son had to assist me in the end. Not very sturdy, scared to let my teenage daughter sit on it (she's a plopper) when she sits. It looks pretty the color is gorgeous however, it feels like the days are number before this chair breaks down. I would not suggest this chair. Also doesn't lean back as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I am pleased with the purchase. Not difficult to put together but I could have used some help getting the arms on. That part was a bit strenuous and could use another person but other than that very simple assembly. The chair is comfortable and lowers or raises. It also rocks a little. Overall I’m very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty chair, easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not waste your time and money
reviews.reviewText: I've been working from home for well over a decade. So you can imagine I've tried various chairs. Some were awesome (and I was sad they were no longer made when the time came to replace them). Some were just ok. So when I tell you this one is by far worst I've ever had the misfortune to buy and sit in, you can trust me.The material feels insanely cheap (think 30 year old chair or couch in a really iffy motel). There is almost no padding in the arms. What padding there is in the seat and back compresses to almost nothing within 60 minutes of use. Yes it does "rebound" when you get out of the chair but then the process just starts over. Basically you end up stiff and sore from knee to lower back after a full work day. What might be worse is this: it does have "tilt lock". However even with it locked, if you lean back even a little bit,so your back is actually resting against the whole back of the chair, the seat tilts back about 20 degrees.If this was a forty dollar chair from one of the big box mega stores, I would understand and say you got what you paid for. But this thing cost me $150 and my cats don't even want to sit in it. (And at least one of them naps in the bathroom sink so it's not like they require extreme comfort!!)Long story short I gave it a full work week and then accepted it was only getting worse. (And yes I tried adding different cushions under me and behind me and got little improvement.) I've given up and ordered a different chair. As soon as it comes, this one is going.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The chair arrived pretty quick. I had it assembled in less than an hour. It's very soft and I love everything about it except the left side arm keeps getting loose. I can't really blame it on the chair. It might be the way I sit in my desk chairs. I sit with my feet in the sit crossing my legs. So it might be me pushing it out when I'm positioning myself. Other than that I love it.
